title: Mitski - The Only Heartbreaker (Official Video)
author: MitskiVEVO
description:
“The Only Heartbreaker” the new song by Mitski from the forthcoming album ‘Laurel Hell’, out February 4th 2022 on Dead Oceans.
Stream/buy - https://mitski.deadoc.co/the-only-heartbreaker
PRE-ORDER: https://mitski.deadoc.co/laurel-hell

Lyrics:
If you would just make one mistake
What a relief that would be
But I think for as long as we’re together
I’ll be the only heartbreaker

I’ll be the only heartbreaker

So I’ll be the loser in this game
I’ll be the bad guy in the play
I’ll be the water main that’s burst and flooding
You’ll be by the window, only watching

I’ll be the only heartbreaker

I apologize 
You forgive me
I apologize
You forgive me

And make me the only heartbreaker
So I’ll be the only heartbreaker

-
